data.eml:eml: Two new species and new records of chiggers (Acari: Leeuwenhoekiidae, Trombiculidae) from birds in Vietnam

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kaluz, Stanislav, Hung, Nguyen Manh, Capek, Miroslav, Literak, Ivan (2016): Two new species and new records of chiggers (Acari: Leeuwenhoekiidae, Trombiculidae) from birds in Vietnam. Zootaxa 4061 (5): 483-503, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4061.5.2
